item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I'm Magnus, this is my website, where I will hopefully write about things I find interesting. I have just finished doing a Master's degree in physics at the University of Bristol, and this autumn I will be joining the machine learning group at the University of Sheffield to do a PhD. I am interested in many different areas of machine learning, but in particular I enjoy those that have some connection to physics (fortunately there are many!
